text: if you've never made hollandaise before
you're gonna think oh my gosh I can't do
that but I'm here to tell you today that
you totally can I have a great technique
for making it with a blender or an
immersion blender which is what I'm
using today that's basically the easiest
thing that you can ever met to start off
with I have two egg yolks in this
measuring cup and I'm adding 1
tablespoon of warm water a tablespoon of
lemon juice 3/4 of a teaspoon of coarse
salt you're thinking that's it that's
what hollandaise is yeah five
ingredients if you can believe it
now take your immersion blender and put
it into your cup and just blend
everything up a little tiny bit the
great thing about the immersion blender
is everything is concentrated in the
bottom of the cup and that's exactly
where you want it because now what
you're gonna do is drizzle in some warm
melted butter this is one stick of
melted butter if you were using a
blender you would just turn on the
blender and pour it through the top just
keep adding it and blending until all of
your butter is been added and then you
have holidays
just as easy as that it's a nice thick
but spoonable sauce not too too thick I
have about two inches of water boiling
in this pot and I'm adding a tiny bit of
vinegar just teaspoon of vinegar it
helps it from shredding apart when you
add your egg the fresher your eggs are
for poaching the better because the egg
white will hold on to the yolk a little
bit better take your egg crack it into a
bowl and just allow the edge of the bowl
to hit the water and then drop your egg
into the water sort of folding the egg
white over the top of your egg that
should help cover it up and make a nice
neat shape you can cook your egg yolks
to your liking I like them runny so
completely set whites cooked runny yolks
I'm just gonna remove my four eggs and
then drain them on paper towels this
actually came out really nice it's a
nice oval of egg white around them I
have my Canadian bacon and English
muffins keeping warm in a 200 degree
oven
delicious
Canadian bacon toasted English muffin a
perfectly poached egg
and some hollandaise sauce and just like
that you have hollandaise and a poached
eggs what do you think about that super
easy and amazingly delicious and you
know what we don't even have to tell
your friends how easy was they can be
impressed
